<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2228</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Center for Civics Education in the United States of America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Mitte für Gemeinschaftskunde-Ausbildung in 
den Staaten von Amerika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le centre pour l'éducation d'éducation civique 
aux Etats-Unis d'Amérique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O centro para a instrução do civics nos Estados 
Unidos da América</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il centro per formazione di civics in unito 
Dichiara dell'America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κέντρο για την εκπαίδευση Civics στις Ηνωμένες 
Πολιτείες της Αμερικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El centro para la educación del civics en los 
Estados Unidos de América</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The site has a collection of Civics lessons separated into Elementary ,Middle and High School levels. The lessons include a teachers lesson plan outline and instructions for the pupils. Other sections of the site offer links to publications,research, professional development and various Civics Education Programs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Citizenship</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">civics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">instruction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lessons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">educational research</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Site hat eine Ansammlung 
Gemeinschaftskundelektionen, die in grundlegende, mittlere und High 
School Stufen getrennt werden. Die Lektionen schließen eine 
Lehrerlektionplanumreiß und -anweisungen für die Pupillen ein. 
Andere Kapitel der Sites bieten Links Publikationen, Forschung, 
professioneller Entwicklung und verschiedenen 
Gemeinschaftskunde-Ausbildung Programmen an</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le site a une collection de leçons d'éducation 
civique séparées dans des niveaux de lycée élémentaire, moyen et.
Les leçons incluent un contour et des instructions de plan de 
leçon de professeurs pour les pupilles. D'autres sections du 
site offrent des liens aux publications, à la recherche, au 
développement professionnel et aux divers programmes d'éducation 
d'éducation civique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O local tem uma coleção das lições do civics 
separadas em níveis da High School elementar, média e. As 
lições incluem um esboço e instruções da planta da lição dos 
professores para as pupilas. Outras seções do local oferecem 
as ligações às publicações, à pesquisa, ao desenvolvimento 
profissional e aos vários programas da instrução do civics</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il luogo ha una collezione di lezioni di civics 
separate nei livelli della High School elementare, centrale e. 
Le lezioni includono un profilo e le istruzioni di programma di 
lezione degli insegnanti per le pupille. Altre sezioni del luogo
offrono i collegamenti alle pubblicazioni, alla ricerca, allo sviluppo
professionale ed ai vari programmi di formazione di civics</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περιοχή έχει μια συλλογή των μαθημάτων Civics που
χωρίζονται στο στοιχειώδες, μέσο και επίπεδο γυμνασίου. Τα 
μαθήματα περιλαμβάνουν ένα περίγραμμα και τις οδηγίες σχεδίων 
μαθήματος δασκάλων για τους μαθητές. Αλλα τμήματα της 
περιοχής προσφέρουν τις συνδέσεις με τις δημοσιεύσεις, την 
έρευνα, την επαγγελματική ανάπτυξη και τα διάφορα προγράμματα 
εκπαίδευσης Civics</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sitio tiene una colección de lecciones del 
civics separadas en niveles de la High School elemental, media y 
secundaria. Las lecciones incluyen un contorno y las 
instrucciones del plan de la lección de los profesores para las 
pupilas. Otras secciones del sitio ofrecen conexiones a las 
publicaciones, a la investigación, al desarrollo profesional y a los 
varios programas de la educación del civics</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Staatsbürgerschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gemeinschaftskunde</string>
